title: Suzuki to Ouji no Senya Ichiya
original_name: 鈴木と王子の千夜一夜
sinopse:
Lazilia is a gem only found in the country Lazilis, and is said to have the power to unite people. Suzuki and Haydar once met at a museum display at a very young age; and now after 15 years, will this jewel have united their fates?

(Source: Good Girls Scan BL)
